title: I get the "Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version" message but nothing's happening
body:
I don't know if other people are getting this message, but I got a message saying 
Well, the gist of it was this
"LoL has reverted back to an older version. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest one."

I logged in and nothing has happened so far, help!

replies.body:
If you get that error, League should begin to repatch the next time you start it. If it does, just let it go through the process and repatch to be sure that your game doesn't have any corrupted files. If it doesn't try to repatch (if it lets you into the client fine and you're able to play games) then you should be fine!

If you're still seeing this error and the client won't patch at all, try running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and it should be able to force a repatch.
i have downloaded the repair tool and I am experiencing problems with the client still. I have selected the force re-patch and start*. after a short time windows will close the program.
